# ch-color-field



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                | Type                      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------- | ----------- |
| `accessibleName` | `accessible-name` | Accessible name for assistive technologies | `string`                  | `undefined` |
| `baseColor`      | `base-color`      | Base color for the gradient                | `string`                  | `undefined` |
| `colorFormat`    | `color-format`    | Color format                               | `"HEX" \| "HSL" \| "RGB"` | `undefined` |
| `height`         | `height`          | Height of the canvas                       | `number`                  | `undefined` |
| `value`          | `value`           | Selected color                             | `string`                  | `undefined` |
| `width`          | `width`           | Width of the canvas                        | `number`                  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event    | Description              | Type                  |
| -------- | ------------------------ | --------------------- |
| `change` | Emit the new color value | `CustomEvent<string>` |
